description:
Robust and reliable:

The next generation of our men’s bestselling, robust and reliable alpine trekking boot. This hard-wearing suede leather classic with a 360° full protective rubber rand is even lighter and more flexible.

Performance Comfort:

Equipped with a waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX® Performance Comfort membrane for weather protection and optimized breathability, it will keep your feet dry and comfortable, including during periods of more intensive activity. And the dual density expanded PU midsole offers a good balance of cushioning and stiffness to cope with both steep ground and flat, rocky terrain.

Support, grip and traction:

The SALEWA 3F system combines secure support with comfortable flexibility, providing more stability on the heel zone, while the self-cleaning Vibram® outsole is engineered for improved grip and traction in a wide range of conditions. Salewa's iconic, lightweight, alpine trekking boot.
name: Salewa Mountain Trainer 2 Mid GTX - Mens

specs.value: Highly wear-resistant fabric, 1.6 mm suede leather, 360 degree full rubber rand, 3F System with Steel Cables
